video.name: ＂Genius, Billionaire, Playboy, Philanthropist＂ Tony Stark vs Steve Rogers - The Avengers (2012) [4-ftbs8TppY].webm

segments.frame_description: A man with dark, wavy hair and a serious expression stares thoughtfully off-camera while seated within a high-tech, industrial interior.
Tony Stark, Captain America, and Nick Fury stand in a high-tech laboratory looking forward with stern expressions.
Tony Stark gestures while speaking to a stoic Captain America inside a high-tech laboratory.
A man in a blue tactical suit speaks with a serious expression in a dimly lit, high-tech indoor environment.
A close-up shows Tony Stark looking off-camera with a serious expression in a dimly lit indoor setting.
Black Widow and Thor stand in a high-tech laboratory, looking off-camera with serious expressions.
A man in a dark blue tactical suit speaks with an intense and serious expression to another person within a blurred, high-tech setting.
Nick Fury, wearing his iconic eyepatch and a black leather jacket, stands inside a futuristic command center and looks off-camera.
A man with a goatee looks intensely at another person, whose back is to the camera, in a dimly lit indoor setting.
A man with a serious expression, wearing a dark blue suit, looks intently at another person in a high-tech indoor setting with blurred mechanical structures in the background.
A man in a blue tactical suit looks intently at another person during a serious conversation in a dimly lit indoor setting.
A man in a purple shirt looks off-camera with a serious expression while standing inside a high-tech facility with a cloudy sky visible through the windows in the background.
A man in a blue suit speaks with another person in an indoor setting.
In a dimly lit indoor setting, Tony Stark gazes intensely with a concerned expression at someone just out of focus.
